lead_paragraph: The urgency of expanding the world’s seed portfolio is made eminently clear in this film directed by Sandy McLeod.

headline.print_headline: Review: Seeds of Time; a Documentary on a Crusader for Crop Diversity
headline.main: Review: ‘Seeds of Time,’ a Documentary on a Crusader for Crop Diversity

snippet: The urgency of expanding the world’s seed portfolio is made eminently clear in this film directed by Sandy McLeod.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews Sandy McLeod documentary film Seeds of Time.
